headline: Adobe Cognizant AI Deal Tests Weak Share Price Against Valuation Upside
summary: Adobe and Cognizant expanded their global collaboration to speed up generative AI adoption for enterprise content creation and governance. The partnership focuses on using Adobe's AI powered platforms to integrate generative AI into creative workflows and improve brand and regulatory compliance at scale. For investors watching NasdaqGS:ADBE, this move comes as the stock trades around $268.38, with returns showing a 20.6% decline over the past 30 days and 38.0% over the past year. Those...

headline: Old favorite software stocks take beating as fear of AI's impact grows
summary: Software stocks tumbled nearly 20% over the week, marking one of its worst weekly performances since the 2022 tech rout.
